titles.title: A bill to provide for a report on the maintenance of Federal land holdings under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior.
A bill to require the collection of certain data relating to Bureau of Land Management land acquisitions, and for other purposes.
A bill to require the collection of certain data relating to Bureau of Land Management land acquisitions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 349.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
This bill requires the Department of the Interior, after the submission of the President's budget for FY2020, to report to Congress on
all federal land holdings under Interior's jurisdiction; and the total costs of maintaining such holdings for FY2017-FY2019, including an accounting of the holdings of, and expenditures made by, each federal agency.
